strapiPost.title: Rooting for the Home Team
strapiPost.content:
With the end of one great season (congrats Brady), another one steps up to the plate. The Arkansas Baseball team's first game is next Friday (Feb. 19) against Texas Tech in Arlington, TX.

  • With a highly anticipated 2020 season dramatically cut short, the Arkansas Razorbacks baseball team is ready and so is B-Unlimited.
  • Today, local apparel company, B-Unlimited is launching their Rooting For The Home Team Arkansas Baseball apparel launch. Whether you're cheering from home or from your seat at Baum Stadium this season, B-Unlimited will have you game day ready.

  • Reader Reward: Use the code daily10 for 10% off your purchase.
